name: Matte
description:
Made for GMTK Jam 2019. Technically beatable, highly unfinished.

A Zelda 1/SNES Goof Troop inspired game that, generously speaking, ended up more like Adventure for the Atari 2600. Based on the prompt "only one," only a single living being, including the player, can move at a time. Pressing Y opens a menu that allows you to choose which entity moves.

Default TIC-80 controls:

KeyboardTICZAXBAXSY
